I think this is the way we shall have to do; we must roll the responsibility upon church members and hold them accountable for the saving 


                                    -96- 

of the souls of those who have never heard the truth. We must solemnly urge upon them the fact that they are to be witnesses for God; and if they are exercising faith in Christ as their personal Saviour, they will accept the burden of responsibility.--Letter 47, 1894, pp. 4, 6, 7. 

Released August 10, 1977.
